$interpreted: Lio: Angel!
Angelia: Lio, are you alright?
Theodore: What an interesting little fella. He told me what happened to you during your stay at the Slums.
Angelia: Just get to the point, Uncle!
Theodore: Fine.
Theodore: First, there were some misunderstandings between us. If any of my previous actions caused you any harm, I offer my sincere apology.
Angelia: Does that include you kidnapping me?
Theodore: You were too young. If you were to take over the throne back then, the only thing awaiting you would have been your downfall.
Theodore: It was the only way I could protect you. I had to smooth things over for you, first.
Naya: Very convincing, Uncle.
Theodore: Sarcasm, really?
Theodore: Listen, we both hope to better the Kingdom, and this civil war will only do it more harm than good.
Theodore: I am sure William would dread the sight of this, were he still alive...
Angelia: Father...
Theodore: More importantly, look at the difference between our armies. If we fought head-on, well, your chances of victory would be slim at best...
Theodore: Once war breaks out, there will be no turning back. So, here is my proposal...
Theodore: If you convince Dylan and his Sunshine Infantry to surrender, then I will drop all previous charges against you. Do you accept?
Angelia: If this would avoid pointless sacrifices, then... I accept.
Naya: Angel!
Angelia: Under one condition: You must return the crown to me and give up your status as a member of the Royal family.
Theodore: Angelia, do you have any idea what you're saying?
Angelia: Of course I do. I can no longer trust you. If you want us to stand down, then you'll accept my condition.
Theodore: Hmph. Then it seems I'll have to resort to force...
Naya: Figured you'd have more than just one guard...
Angelia: Still, he couldn't have brought too many, or we would have noticed.
Theodore: What?
Angelia: You know I'd have no chance of winning if I were to fight you head-on.
Angelia: I had to assume you'd think I was naive enough only to bring Naya with me today.

Theodore: Sounds like I caused some serious casualties...
I do hope Dylan was one of them...
Angelia: What happened!?
Theodore: On one hand, you are right. I certainly couldn't bring too many men with me.
Theodore: On the other hand, locating Dylan's possible ambush points and setting up rune traps wasn't too difficult.
Angelia: How did you know...
Theodore: Who do you think all those illegal miners report to? They know every nook and cranny in Totemtaff.
Theodore: It wasn't hard to guess where Dylan would place his men.
Theodore: What a pity. If you hadn't resisted, your soldiers would still be alive and kicking.
Theodore: Now, it's time for me to take you back to where you belong!
Naya: Angel, I'll buy you some time. Grab Lio and get the hell out of here! There are still plenty of troops back at headquarters.
Naya: Once you get back, Theodore won't be able to do anything!
Angelia: What about you!?
Naya: Don't worry about me! This country is as good as finished if you're captured. Now go!

Model.Text: Angel!
Lio, are you alright?
What an interesting little fella. He told me what happened to you during your stay at the Slums.
Just get to the point, Uncle!
Fine.
First, there were some misunderstandings between us. If any of my previous actions caused you any harm, I offer my sincere apology.
Does that include you kidnapping me?
You were too young. If you were to take over the throne back then, the only thing awaiting you would have been your downfall.
It was the only way I could protect you. I had to smooth things over for you, first.
Very convincing, Uncle.

I am sure William would dread the sight of this, were he still alive...

Once war breaks out, there will be no turning back. So, here is my proposal...
If you convince Dylan and his Sunshine Infantry to surrender, then I will drop all previous charges against you. Do you accept?
If this would avoid pointless sacrifices, then... I accept.
Angel!
Under one condition: You must return the crown to me and give up your status as a member of the Royal family.

Of course I do. I can no longer trust you. If you want us to stand down, then you'll accept my condition.
Hmph. Then it seems I'll have to resort to force...

Still, he couldn't have brought too many, or we would have noticed.

You know I'd have no chance of winning if I were to fight you head-on.

Sounds like I caused some serious casualties...
I do hope Dylan was one of them...
What happened!?
On one hand, you are right. I certainly couldn't bring too many men with me.
On the other hand, locating Dylan's possible ambush points and setting up rune traps wasn't too difficult.
How did you know...
Who do you think all those illegal miners report to? They know every nook and cranny in Totemtaff.
It wasn't hard to guess where Dylan would place his men.
What a pity. If you hadn't resisted, your soldiers would still be alive and kicking.
Now, it's time for me to take you back to where you belong!
Angel, I'll buy you some time. Grab Lio and get the hell out of here! There are still plenty of troops back at headquarters.
Once you get back, Theodore won't be able to do anything!
What about you!?
Don't worry about me! This country is as good as finished if you're captured. Now go!
